name: Woods Defense: Fairy's Power
description:
Finally The Challenging Towers Defense Game Comes Back!
If you like TD, you definitely should try this game out.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Features & Benefits
✔ Solid Fixed Path Towers Defense Game.
✔ 11 Challenging Maps With Various Bosses.
✔ Various Unique Towers With Their Unique Upgrades.
✔ Unique Challenging BOSS In Almost Every Map.
✔ Use Powerful Skill Of Fairies To Defeat Monsters.
✔ 2 Difficulty With Great Replay Value.
✔ Challenge 3 Endless Wave Maps With GameCenter LeaderBoards Support.
✔ Unlock Various Strategic Upgrades Without Additional IAP.
✔ High Quality Music & Sound.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements
✔ Recommended: iPhone3GS or up, iPad or up.
✔ Works both with iPhone & iPad.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note
✔ Uncheck the "Tree Shake" option if you are using old device or feel any performance issue.
